brewery.brewery_description:
Lion Brewery (Ceylon) PLC is home to the legendary Lion Beer. Birthed and conceptualized on traditional brewing recipes and techniques since 1860, today, Lion Beer has etched an illustrious path to become Sri Lanka's benchmarked leader in the market. Infusing world class best practices, innovation, state of the art technology and a knowledge pool that remains beyond comparison, Lion Beer reflects a true Sri Lankan Brand constructed on a global platform of excellence.

As a respected and responsible industry leader, we ensure that our products are designed, produced and marketed conscientiously and with accountability. We are committed unwaveringly to creating value for our stakeholders and in infusing visionary environmental standards into our processes. As a responsible corporate spearhead, we proudly uphold ethics, values and principles in a 'beyond compliance' milieu.

As is symptomatic of the industry, we must be aware that ours is an adult product and hence, in all aspects of our business, we are completely cognizant that our actions are constructed on a platform of immense responsibility. Thus, as a leading corporate steward, we maintain our product portfolio with pride and responsibility, ensuring that the product we produce reflects the state of the art technology and best practices we have always permeated and that it is aligned to the contemporary needs and wants of our loyal consumers.

items.checkin_comment: Found the Sri Lankan market. Dryish saltana & pale rubber. Should’ve picked up the stout.

beer.beer_description: Undoubtedly the best selling among our mild beers, Lion Lager has a 4.8% alcohol volume and is credited as a great thirst quencher. Golden roasted malt in colour with a hint of fruit and caramel flavouring, it is very slightly sweet with less hop notes. The attractive labeling is in sophisticated black and gold, showcasing our strong but watchful golden lion as the king of the savannah, symbolising visionary leadership and power.

items.badge_description: Traveling the world is hard, but not for you. It's as easy as cracking open a new brew! You have had a beer from at least 170 different regions around the world. Try 5 more for Level 35!
Travel much? You must be a "brewsetter". That's at least a beer from 40 different countries. Try 5 more for Level 9!

beer.beer_description:
Lion stout (Sinha Stout) is brewed in Sri Lanka (Ceylon) and has a heritage dating back to 1881. It is a traditional stout with a blend of chocolate, coffee and toffee flavours. It has an extraordinary chocolate, mocha liqueur like character.

The 8.0 per cent abv, bottle conditioned beer is brewed from British, Czech and Danish malts with Styrian hops and an English yeast strain. All the ingredients are transported along precarious roads to the brewery located 3,500 feet above sea level.

Undoubtedly the best selling among our mild beers, Lion Lager has a 4.8% alcohol volume and is credited as a great thirst quencher. Golden roasted malt in colour with a hint of fruit and caramel flavouring, it is very slightly sweet with less hop notes. The attractive labeling is in sophisticated black and gold, showcasing our strong but watchful golden lion as the king of the savannah, symbolising visionary leadership and power.

Undoubtedly the best selling among our mild beers, Lion Lager has a 4.8% alcohol volume and is credited as a great thirst quencher. Golden roasted malt in colour with a hint of fruit and caramel flavouring, it is very slightly sweet with less hop notes. The attractive labeling is in sophisticated black and gold, showcasing our strong but watchful golden lion as the king of the savannah, symbolising visionary leadership and power.

items.badge_description: Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 370 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%.  Try 5 more for Level 75!
After a long day, what better way to kick back than with a crisp and refreshing lager? You're already feeling more relaxed, aren’t you?. That’s 175 different Lagers! Try 5 more for Level 36!

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 155 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 32!

items.comment:
Masse F. är det Cattis som skrivit mht antalet emojis?
Nellie hälsa pappa och gratta!

user.bio:
Life's good! Enjoying it to the max! 
Used to think "craft" was short for Can't Remember A F*cking Thing...

beer.beer_description:
Lion stout (Sinha Stout) is brewed in Sri Lanka (Ceylon) and has a heritage dating back to 1881. It is a traditional stout with a blend of chocolate, coffee and toffee flavours. It has an extraordinary chocolate, mocha liqueur like character.

The 8.0 per cent abv, bottle conditioned beer is brewed from British, Czech and Danish malts with Styrian hops and an English yeast strain. All the ingredients are transported along precarious roads to the brewery located 3,500 feet above sea level.

Undoubtedly the best selling among our mild beers, Lion Lager has a 4.8% alcohol volume and is credited as a great thirst quencher. Golden roasted malt in colour with a hint of fruit and caramel flavouring, it is very slightly sweet with less hop notes. The attractive labeling is in sophisticated black and gold, showcasing our strong but watchful golden lion as the king of the savannah, symbolising visionary leadership and power.
Longer matured, and brewed using an innovative cold-hopping technique, it's a little more mellow than a regular Pilsner.
